name: SmoothImage
description: SmoothImage allows smoothing of images with adjustable sigma values, offering optional median filtering functionality.

inputs.name: Image Dimension
inputs.description: Specifies the dimensionality of the image.

inputs.name: Image File
inputs.description: The input image file to be smoothed.

inputs.name: Smoothing Sigma
inputs.description: The sigma value for smoothing. A separate sigma may be specified for each dimension, e.g., '1.5x1x2'.

inputs.name: Sigma Units
inputs.description: Determines if sigma is in spacing units (1) or not (0). Default is 0.

inputs.name: Use Median Filter
inputs.description: Whether to use median filter. Default is 0. If using median filter, sigma represents the radius in voxels.

author: ANTs Developers
